name: POOR: American Airlines FIRST CLASS 777-200 Chicago to Miami
description:
American carriers don't have a good reputation. I flew in domestic first class from Chicago to Miami and ended up on American Airlines' goofy business class seat...again. This one was pretty busted up and dirty. Not great. Four hour delay at Thanksgiving too! Sheesh. 

0:00 Introduction
2:30 American Airlines Admirals Club at ORD
4:30 777-200 arrives from London Heathrow
5:03 Boarding
5:46 Business class (sold as domestic first!) on this 777-200
6:28 Taxi and takeoff
8:11 Seat overview and general criticisms
8:32 Route map
9:07 Seat tour
10:12 "Lunch" hmmmmm!
11:00 In flight entertainment
11:39 It's not ALL bad!
12:20 Conclusions, fare paid, and thank you and goodbye!
